DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety pharmacokinetic property CJ-30039 Lipidil Supra
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Safety Pharmacokinetic Properties CJ-30039 Lipidil Supra
DOC.detailed_description: Study objectives - To compare safety pharmacokinetic property CJ-30039 Lipidil Supra single oral administration healthy male volunteer . - To evaluate food-effect pharmacokinetics CJ-30039 single oral administration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer age 20 55 year old BMI ( Body Mass Index ) range 18.5 25kg/m2 Subject history significant chronic disease History clinically significant allergy , include fenofibric acid Fenofibrate History clinically significant hepatic , renal , neurology , psychiatric , pulmonary , endocrine , hematologic , cardiovascular disease History surgery except gastrointestinal disease might significantly change absorption medicine Clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range AST ( ASpartate Transaminase ) , ALT ( ALanine Transaminase ) ( > 1.25 time normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5 time normal range BUN ( Blood Urea Nitrogen ) > 25 mg/dL Creatinine > 1.4 mg/dL CK ( Creatine Kinase ) > 1.25 time normal range Estimated GFR ( Glomerular Filtration Rate ) < 80 mL/min/1.73m2 Clinically significant vital sign SBP ( Systolic Blood Pressure ) ≤ 90 mmHg SBP ≥ 150 mmHg DBP ( Diastolic Blood Pressure ) ≤ 50 mmHg DBP ≥ 100 mmHg History drug abuse positive urine screen drug History caffeine , alcohol , smoke abuse caffeine > 5 cups/day alcohol > 201g/week smoking > 10 cigarettes/day Use prescription medicine oriental medicine within 14 day dose use nonprescription medicine within 7 day dose Participated previous clinical trial within 60 day prior dose Donated blood within 60 day prior dose
